Name: Unicef
Description: International Charity, led by Executive Director Catherine Russell
Reason: The head of Unicef, Catherine Russell is married to the chairman of BlackRock investments, one of the largest investors in weapons companies in the world. This is a major conflict of interest and Unicef should not be trusted.
How to Boycott: Don't donate to Unicef fundraisers. Don't run Unicef fundraisers in your place of work or community.
Alternatives: Muslims Around The World. Ummah Welfare Trust. One Ummah.
